title: Fabulous large 1BR in central West Vil, doorman, full luxe!
posting_body: ['BEAUTIFUL SPACIOUS ONE BEDROOM', 'GLEAMING PRISTINE RENO', 'GREAT FOR ENTERTAINING', 'SEPARATE WINDOWED KITCHEN WITH DISHWASHER AND NEW APPLIANCES', 'FANTASTIC CLOSET SPACE', 'FULL TIME DOORMAN', 'EXCELLENT CENTRAL LOCATION JUST 2 BLOCKS TO TRAIN', 'LOVELY SHARED COURTYARD', 'ELEVATOR', 'LAUNDRY ROOM', 'PACKAGE ROOM', 'PETS WELCOME', '12% BROKER FEE', 'TEXT PAM AT 516.262.3693', 'TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING VIRTUALLY OR IN PERSON.', "WON'T LAST!", 'VIDEO HERE:', 'https://youtu.be/QNn803-BZ1w', 'Hi everyone, we have a fabulous one bedroom with awesome amenities in a great central West Village location near Washington Square Park available immediately.', 'Bright, gleaming, sunny, very large, private, quiet, facing gorgeous tree views, doorman, pet friendly.', 'Massive king size bedroom.', 'Amazing Greenwich Village location in the heart of it all - will not last.', 'Prime central west village location literally steps from the train, short walk to Washington Square Park and West 4th street station with the ABCDF trains, super close to the 1 train and the PATH as well.', 'Live the dream among all the best restaurants, bars, comedy clubs and jazz clubs in Greenwich Village!', 'This is a residential NYC neighborhood with tons of supermarkets, drycleaners, hardware stores, take-out spots, 24 hr bodegas, etc.', 'Easy walking distance to Soho, East Village, Lower East Side, Union Square, Nolita, Little Italy, etc.', 'Small, friendly Greenwich village landlord requires 1 month rent and 1 month security and out of town guarantors are accepted as needed.', 'We are a long-time local realtor specializing in the areas we know and love best, happy to assist our clients through these challenging times.', 'The landlord requires that we ask prospective tenants a few questions before showing the unit, text 516.262.3693 for immediate response, otherwise if you need to email please add a US contact number.', 'Thank you!', 'Cheers,', 'Pam and Nick', '516.262.3696', 'WE HAVE MULTIPLE LISTINGS FOR 1, 2, 3, 4 AND 5 BEDROOMS THROUGHOUT THE EAST AND WEST VILLAGE, LES AND UNION SQUARE AREA, ALL NO FEE.', 'CALL US TODAY AND WE’LL BE HAPPY TO ASSIST IN YOUR SEARCH.', 'ALSO CHECK OUT NICK’S BLOG FOR THE BEST OF EATING AND DRINKING IN THE EAST VILLAGE:', '<URL>']
